sentence.Network_en: Cordierite - Mullite Board: It is made by high sintering cordierite and mullite together.
sentence.Network_cn: 堇青石 — 莫来石棚板: 是以堇青石,莫来石两种材料混合成型,经高温烧结而成.

sentence.Network_en: It is found that homogeneous, dense and single - phase C 0.6 M 0.4 ZP coating was successfully deposited on cordierite ceramic.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果表明,在堇青石表面制备的涂层均匀致密,由 单相 的C0.6M0.4ZP组成.

sentence.Network_en: The cordierite glass - ceramics were prepared using high alumina fly ash as the main raw material.
sentence.Network_cn: 以高铝粉煤灰为主要原料,制备了堇青石微晶玻璃.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: named after Pierre L. A. Cordier (1777–1861), French geologist, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a blue mineral of magnesium and iron and aluminum and silicon and oxygen; often used as a gemstone
